select plan.DELIVERY_TIME, plan.DELIVERY_TYPE, plan.IS_RANDOM, plan.CD_CATEGORY_ID, plan.RANDOM_NUM, plan.price, cc.id as company_id, cc.company_name, su.realName as managerName, su.id as manager_id, table_plan.* from tb_table_plan table_plan left join cd_plan plan on table_plan.CD_PLAN_ID= plan.id left join cd_member cm on table_plan.cd_member_id = cm.id left join cd_company cc on cm.cd_company_id = cc.id left join sys_users su on cm.cd_user_id = su.id
table_plan.IS_STOP = 0 and table_plan.TOTAL_SEND_VALUE > table_plan.SEND_VALUE
AND DATE_FORMAT(table_plan.BEGIN_TIME ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{currentDate}
and table_plan.send_week_day like CONCAT('%', #{weekday}, '%')
select 1 as count_value, id as cd_item_id from cd_item where CD_CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} order by RAND() LIMIT #{limit}
